verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me again <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> there were <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>women,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H517>mother;<s%>

and they <S%H2181>played<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> They <S%H2181>played<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> in their <S%H5271>youth;<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> their <S%H7699>breasts<s%> were <S%H4600>pressed,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> their <S%H1331>virgin<s%> <S%H1717>bosom<s%> was <S%H9439>handled.<s%>

"And their <S%H8034>names<s%> were <S%H170>Oholah<s%> the <S%H1419>elder<s%> and <S%H172>Oholibah<s%> her <S%H269>sister.<s%> And they <S%H1961>became<s%> Mine, and they <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%> And [as for] their <S%H8034>names,<s%> <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> is <S%H170>Oholah,<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> is <S%H172>Oholibah.<s%>

"And <S%H170>Oholah<s%> <S%H2181>played<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> <S%H8478>while<s%> she was <S%H8478>Mine;<s%> and she <S%H5689>lusted<s%> <S%H5921>after<s%> her <S%H157>lovers,<s%> <S%H413>after<s%> the <S%H804>Assyrians,<s%> [her] <S%H7138>neighbors,<s%>

who were <S%H3847>clothed<s%> in <S%H8504>purple,<s%> <S%H6346>governors<s%> and <S%H5461>officials,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H2531>desirable<s%> <S%H970>young<s%> <S%H970>men,<s%> <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> <S%H7392>riding<s%> on <S%H5483>horses.<s%>

"And she <S%H5414>bestowed<s%> her <S%H8457>harlotries<s%> on them, <S%H3605>all<s%> of whom [were] the <S%H4005>choicest<s%> <S%H1121>men<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria;<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> she <S%H5689>lusted<s%> after, with <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H1544>idols<s%> she <S%H2930>defiled<s%> herself.

"And she did not <S%H5800>forsake<s%> her <S%H8457>harlotries<s%> from [the time in] <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> for in her <S%H5271>youth<s%> men had <S%H7901>lain<s%> with her, and they <S%H9439>handled<s%> her <S%H1331>virgin<s%> <S%H1717>bosom<s%> and <S%H8210>poured<s%> out their <S%H8457>lust<s%> on her.

<S%H3651>"Therefore,<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> her into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of her <S%H157>lovers,<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1121>Assyrians,<s%> <S%H804><s%> <S%H5921>after<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> she <S%H5689>lusted.<s%>

"They <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness;<s%> they <S%H3947>took<s%> her <S%H1121>sons<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> but they <S%H2026>slew<s%> her with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%> Thus she <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H8034>byword<s%> among <S%H802>women,<s%> and they <S%H6213>executed<s%> <S%H8196>judgments<s%> on her.

"Now her <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H172>Oholibah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> [this,] yet she was <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H7843>corrupt<s%> in her <S%H5691>lust<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> she, and her <S%H8457>harlotries<s%> were <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H2183>harlotries<s%> of her <S%H269>sister.<s%>

"She <S%H5689>lusted<s%> <S%H413>after<s%> the <S%H1121>Assyrians,<s%> <S%H804><s%> <S%H6346>governors<s%> and <S%H5461>officials,<s%> the <S%H7138>ones<s%> <S%H7138>near,<s%> <S%H4358>magnificently<s%> <S%H3847>dressed,<s%> <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> <S%H7392>riding<s%> on <S%H5483>horses,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H2531>desirable<s%> <S%H970>young<s%> <S%H970>men.<s%>
"And I <S%H7200>saw<s%> that she had <S%H2930>defiled<s%> herself; they <S%H8147>both<s%> took the <S%H259>same<s%> <S%H1870>way.<s%>

"So she <S%H3254>increased<s%> her <S%H8457>harlotries.<s%> And she <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H2707>portrayed<s%> on the <S%H7023>wall,<s%> <S%H6754>images<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> <S%H2710>portrayed<s%> with <S%H8350>vermilion,<s%>

<S%H2289>girded<s%> with <S%H232>belts<s%> on their <S%H4975>loins,<s%> with <S%H5628>flowing<s%> <S%H2871>turbans<s%> on their <S%H7218>heads,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H4758>looking<s%> like <S%H7991>officers,<s%> <S%H1823>like<s%> the <S%H1121>Babylonians<s%> <S%H894><s%> [in] <S%H3778>Chaldea,<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H4138>birth.<s%>
"And when she <S%H4758>saw<s%> <S%H5869><s%> them she <S%H5689>lusted<s%> <S%H5921>after<s%> them and <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to them in <S%H3778>Chaldea.<s%>

"And the <S%H1121>Babylonians<s%> <S%H894><s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to her to the <S%H4904>bed<s%> of <S%H1730>love,<s%> and they <S%H2930>defiled<s%> her with their <S%H8457>harlotry.<s%> And when she had <S%H2930>been<s%> <S%H2930>defiled<s%> by them, she <S%H3363>became<s%> <S%H3363>disgusted<s%> with them.

"And she <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> her <S%H8457>harlotries<s%> and <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness;<s%> then I <S%H3363>became<s%> <S%H3363>disgusted<s%> with her, as I had <S%H5361>become<s%> <S%H5361>disgusted<s%> with her <S%H269>sister.<s%>

"Yet she <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> her <S%H8457>harlotries,<s%> <S%H2142>remembering<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of her <S%H5271>youth,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> she <S%H2181>played<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

"And she <S%H5689>lusted<s%> <S%H5921>after<s%> their <S%H6370>paramours,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is [like] the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of <S%H2543>donkeys<s%> and whose <S%H2231>issue<s%> is [like] the <S%H2231>issue<s%> of <S%H5483>horses.<s%>

"Thus you <S%H6485>longed<s%> for the <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> of your <S%H5271>youth,<s%> when the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H9439>handled<s%> your <S%H1717>bosom<s%> <S%H4616>because<s%> of the <S%H7699>breasts<s%> of your <S%H5271>youth.<s%>

<S%H3651>"Therefore,<s%> O <S%H172>Oholibah,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H2009>'Behold<s%> I will <S%H5782>arouse<s%> your <S%H157>lovers<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, from <S%H834>whom<s%> you were <S%H5361>alienated,<s%> and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> them <S%H5921>against<s%> you from <S%H5439>every<s%> side: <S%H5439><s%>

the <S%H1121>Babylonians<s%> <S%H894><s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> <S%H6489>Pekod<s%> and <S%H7772>Shoa<s%> and <S%H6970>Koa,<s%> [and] <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>Assyrians<s%> <S%H804><s%> with them; <S%H2531>desirable<s%> <S%H970>young<s%> <S%H970>men,<s%> <S%H6346>governors<s%> and <S%H5461>officials<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them, <S%H7991>officers<s%> and <S%H7121>men<s%> of <S%H7121>renown,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H7392>riding<s%> on <S%H5483>horses.<s%>

'And they will <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you with <S%H2021>weapons,<s%> <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and <S%H1534>wagons,<s%> and with a <S%H6951>company<s%> of <S%H5971>peoples.<s%> They will <S%H7760>set<s%> themselves <S%H5921>against<s%> you on <S%H5439>every<s%> <S%H5439>side<s%> with <S%H6793>buckler<s%> and <S%H4043>shield<s%> and <S%H6959>helmet;<s%> and I shall <S%H5414>commit<s%> the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> to them, and they will <S%H8199>judge<s%> you according to their <S%H4941>customs.<s%>

'And I will <S%H5414>set<s%> My <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> against you, that they may <S%H6213>deal<s%> with you in <S%H2534>wrath.<s%> They will <S%H5493>remove<s%> your <S%H639>nose<s%> and your <S%H241>ears;<s%> and your <S%H319>survivors<s%> will <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%> They will <S%H3947>take<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters;<s%> and your <S%H319>survivors<s%> will be <S%H398>consumed<s%> by the <S%H784>fire.<s%>
'They will also <S%H6584>strip<s%> you of your <S%H899>clothes<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> away your <S%H8597>beautiful<s%> <S%H3627>jewels.<s%>

'Thus I shall make your <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> and your <S%H2184>harlotry<s%> [brought] from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%> from you, so that you will not <S%H5375>lift<s%> up your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to them or <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H5750>anymore.<s%>'

"For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of those <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H8130>hate,<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of those from <S%H834>whom<s%> you were <S%H5361>alienated.<s%>

'And they will <S%H6213>deal<s%> with you in <S%H8135>hatred,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3018>property,<s%> and <S%H5800>leave<s%> you <S%H5903>naked<s%> and <S%H6181>bare.<s%> And the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your <S%H2183>harlotries<s%> shall be <S%H1540>uncovered,<s%> both your <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> and your <S%H8457>harlotries.<s%>

<S%H428>'These<s%> <S%H428>things<s%> will be <S%H6213>done<s%> to you because you have <S%H2181>played<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> with the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> you have <S%H2930>defiled<s%> yourself with their <S%H1544>idols.<s%>
'You have <S%H1980>walked<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of your <S%H269>sister;<s%> therefore I will <S%H5414>give<s%> her <S%H3563>cup<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>'

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> 'You will <S%H8354>drink<s%> your sister's <S%H3563>cup,<s%> Which is <S%H6013>deep<s%> and <S%H7342>wide.<s%> You will be <S%H6712>laughed<s%> at and held in <S%H3933>derision;<s%> It <S%H3557>contains<s%> <S%H4767>much.<s%>

'You will be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H7943>drunkenness<s%> and <S%H3015>sorrow,<s%> The <S%H3563>cup<s%> of <S%H8047>horror<s%> and <S%H8077>desolation,<s%> The <S%H3563>cup<s%> of your <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H8111>Samaria.<s%>

'And you will <S%H8354>drink<s%> it and <S%H4680>drain<s%> it. Then you will <S%H1633>gnaw<s%> its <S%H2789>fragments<s%> And <S%H5423>tear<s%> your <S%H7699>breasts;<s%> for I have <S%H1696>spoken,<s%>' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>

<S%H3651>"Therefore,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H3282>'Because<s%> you have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> Me and <S%H7993>cast<s%> Me <S%H310>behind<s%> your <S%H1458>back,<s%> <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H1571>now<s%> the [punishment] of your <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> and your <S%H8457>harlotries.<s%>'"

Moreover, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> will you <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H170>Oholah<s%> and <S%H172>Oholibah<s%>? Then <S%H5046>declare<s%> to them their <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>

"For they have <S%H5003>committed<s%> <S%H5003>adultery,<s%> and <S%H1818>blood<s%> is on their <S%H3027>hands.<s%> Thus they have <S%H5003>committed<s%> <S%H5003>adultery<s%> with their <S%H1544>idols<s%> and <S%H1571>even<s%> caused their <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> they <S%H3205>bore<s%> to Me, to <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> [the fire] to them as <S%H402>food.<s%>

<S%H5750>"Again,<s%> they have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> to Me: they have <S%H2930>defiled<s%> My <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> on the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> and have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> My <S%H7676>sabbaths.<s%>

"For when they had <S%H7819>slaughtered<s%> their <S%H1121>children<s%> for their <S%H1544>idols,<s%> they <S%H935>entered<s%> My <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> on the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H2490>profane<s%> it; and <S%H2009>lo,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> My <S%H1004>house.<s%>

<S%H637>"Furthermore,<s%> they have <S%H3588>even<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> for <S%H376>men<s%> who <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H4801>afar,<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> a <S%H4397>messenger<s%> was <S%H7971>sent;<s%> and <S%H2009>lo,<s%> they <S%H935>came<s%> – for <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H7364>bathed,<s%> <S%H3583>painted<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H5710>decorated<s%> <S%H5710>yourselves<s%> with <S%H5716>ornaments;<s%>

and you <S%H3427>sat<s%> on a <S%H3519>splendid<s%> <S%H4296>couch<s%> with a <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H6186>arranged<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> it, on which you had <S%H7760>set<s%> My <S%H7004>incense<s%> and My <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

"And the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of a <S%H7961>carefree<s%> <S%H1995>multitude<s%> was with her; and <S%H5433>drunkards<s%> were <S%H935>brought<s%> from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> with <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H7230>common<s%> <S%H120><s%> <S%H7230>sort.<s%> <S%H120><s%> And they <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H6781>bracelets<s%> on the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the women and <S%H8597>beautiful<s%> <S%H5850>crowns<s%> on their <S%H7218>heads.<s%>
"Then I <S%H559>said<s%> concerning her who was <S%H1087>worn<s%> out by <S%H5004>adulteries,<s%> 'Will they <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H2181>commit<s%> <S%H2181>adultery<s%> with her when she is [thus]?'

"But they <S%H935>went<s%> in to her as they would <S%H935>go<s%> in to a <S%H2181>harlot.<s%> <S%H3651>Thus<s%> they <S%H935>went<s%> in to <S%H170>Oholah<s%> and to <S%H172>Oholibah,<s%> the <S%H2154>lewd<s%> <S%H802>women.<s%>

"But they, <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> will <S%H8199>judge<s%> them with the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of <S%H5003>adulteresses,<s%> and with the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of women who <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they are <S%H5003>adulteresses<s%> and <S%H1818>blood<s%> is on their <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

"For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H5927>'Bring<s%> up a <S%H6951>company<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them, and <S%H5414>give<s%> them over to <S%H2113>terror<s%> and <S%H957>plunder.<s%>

'And the <S%H6951>company<s%> will <S%H7275>stone<s%> them with <S%H68>stones<s%> and <S%H1254>cut<s%> them <S%H1254>down<s%> with their <S%H2719>swords;<s%> they will <S%H2026>slay<s%> their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> and <S%H8313>burn<s%> their <S%H1004>houses<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

'Thus I shall make <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> <S%H7673>cease<s%> from the <S%H776>land,<s%> that <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> may be <S%H3256>admonished<s%> and not <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> as you have done.

'And your <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> will be <S%H5414>requited<s%> upon you, and you will <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H2399>penalty<s%> of [worshiping] your <S%H1544>idols;<s%> thus you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>' "
